thread.section_title: Novotel Roma Eur - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely no 4 stars!
thread.title_full: Absolutely no 4 stars! - Review of Novotel Roma Eur, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Ted V
title: Absolutely no 4 stars!
text: Don't know how they got 4, but facilities and service are closer to 2 stars, not 4, no way. Just stating on arrival that restaurants are closed on saturday afternoon and sunday does not do it when being there for the weekend. Room is outdated and not really clean. Marks of previous guests and actions on flooring, curtains, bathroom and more. Asking for a drink with three people doing nothing seems to much. Being far away from public transportation is a set back (although known upfront). Breakfast is simple but decent and ok. Only go there when the price is right.
